      @GetMapping("/admins/requests") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ManagerPlusResponse>> getRequests​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int active, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int scadute)
      Get managers by their request.
      Parameters:
      active - the active or not (the manager is active of not)
      scadute - if the manager has to renew his activation
      Returns:
      all managers that has the selected request
